column6: Welcome! I'm VirtualCarolyn. I'm here to have an interactive dialogue with you to assist you in your programming task.
What type of android app are you planning to develop?
I am waiting for your response to start. Please ask for help if you are stuck.
TEXT
Welcome! I'm VirtualCarolyn. I'm here to have an interactive dialogue with you to assist you in your programming task.
What type of android app are you planning to develop?
I want to develop a voice recorder app
Great, I'll help you create a plan for an audio recorder.
Should we get started?
yes
Spend some time coming up with your initial plan. Press "I'm ready" button when you think you are done. Let me know if you have any questions!
I have no idea where to start
We need to set an output format type on recorder object.
but how ?
It seems you have a question regarding output format.
I can help you to decide the output file format to be used and example code snippet to do it.
Have you decided or a format, or do you know of any you can use?
No
Ok
Maybe this will help:

Possible audio formats include:
aac_adts
default format
mpeg_4
raw_amr
three_gpp
webm
wav
amr_nb
amr_wb
Which one you will like to choose?
mpeg

You can use MPEG4 media file format using following code snippet
			
			mRecorder.setOutputFormat(MediaRecorder.OutputFormat.MPEG_4);
Ok, move on.
I will use vorbis audio encoder
Yes, we need to set an audio encoder for the recorder object.
Move on and decide other steps.
Which recorder api should I use ?
Correct, we need to create a new instance/object for recorder and choose a recorder api to use.
It seems you have a question regarding recorder instance.
I can help you decide on the type of recorder api to use and give you an example code snippet.
Have you decided on a recorder api to use?
What are my choices ?
Ok
Maybe this will help:
You can record audio using the MediaRecorder or AudioRecord APIs if supported by the device hardware
Which one would you like to choose?
What's the difference between them ?

If you use MediaRecorder, it will record compressed audio into a file.
			
If you use AudioRecord, you must read and compress the audio from the internal buffer separately.

MediaRecorder can record only the following file types: AAC_ADTS, AMR_NB, AMR_WB, MPEG_4, RAW_AMR, THREE_GPP, WEBM
Which api will you use?
mediarecorder
Ok, move on and decide other steps.
Plan is not yet complete. You are missing some steps. Let me help you with this.
We need to prepare the recorder instance before starting it.
I am waiting for your response to start. Please ask for help if you are stuck.
but how ?
Call recorder_obj.prepare() on the Recorder instance.
Is it clear?
ok
Ok
